channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Divergence Opportunity is Still in Play (Don’t Delay)
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Earnings season has been mixed, but here’s a bullish signal few are talking about: a surge in CEOs mentioning “earnings bottoming out”...
